Package com.jimmyselectronics

Interface AbstractDeviceListener

All Known Subinterfaces:
BarcodeScannerListener, CardReaderListener, ElectronicScaleListener, KeyboardListener, KeyListener, ReceiptPrinterListener, ReusableBagDispenserListener, TouchScreenListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
SampleBarcodeScannerListener
public interface AbstractDeviceListener
This class represents the abstract interface for all device listeners. All subclasses should add their own event notification methods, the first parameter of which should always be the device affected.
Author:
Jimmy's Electronics LLP
